General.Name: Yungjin Pharm Co Ltd
General.Description: Yungjin Pharm. Co., Ltd. operates as a pharmaceutical company in South Korea. It provides cephalosporin antibiotic, antipsychotic, cardiovascular, and nutrition products. The company was founded in 1952 and is headquartered in Seoul, South Korea. Yungjin Pharm. Co., Ltd. is a subsidiary of KT&G Corporation.
